about_the_game:
Get your JUICE on

DuckLaserDuck is one of the juiciest roguelites around, bursting with bright colors, massive explosions, and over-the-top VFX. Unlike other games that limit your synergies, DLD throws the doors wide open. With a vast arsenal of upgrades at your disposal, you can craft wild, overpowered combos without restraint. Buckle up—things are about to get crazy!

Accuracy Note - January 2025

DuckLaserDuck is being updated about 2-5 times per month, including major additions, changes, VFX, and audio updates. This store page is not receiving that kind of attention, so this page may not be accurate at all times.

Gameplay

Blast your way through a vibrant, straight-shot series of enemy-filled rooms—each offering two doorways that ultimately lead you down the same path of escalating mayhem. Arm yourself with upgrades, worms, and items that boost your offensive power in wild, unexpected ways. Chain lightning triggers explosive on-hit effects, while elemental powers like burning, poison, and frost add extra layers of destruction. Feel the rush as you stack critical hit bonuses and experiment with bizarre synergies that can fill the screen with chaos. With each new room, foes grow tougher, demanding clever combos and relentless firepower. Will you push your build to its absolute limit, or get overwhelmed by the swarm?

Features

  • Weapon Variety: Choose from 4 weapon types—Machinegun, Piercer, Shotgun, and Seeker—to suit your style.

  • Upgrade Overload: Unlock 38 potent upgrades, including Chain Lightning, More Bullets, Explosions, Wiggly Bullets, Critical Hits, Poison, Burn, Frost, Auto-Tracking Bullets, Massive Fire Rate, Huge bullets, Bouncing shots that ricochet across the room, you can even make your aim worse if you want... so bad that you fire in every direction at once.

  • Devious Traps: Avoid or exploit hazards like laser turrets.

  • Elemental Mayhem: Inflict and combine elemental effects (poison, burn, frost) to decimate swarms of creatures.

  • Creepy Crawlies: Face off against ankle-biting ants, dragonflies that lob egg-bombs, frogs with tongues like yoyo-cannons, and grubs that pop out of the ground to spit burst shots.

  • Menacing Bosses:

    • Meat Harvester (Praying Mantis): Charges you down, slicing with scythe-arms—or launching them like boomerangs from afar.

    • King of Worms: Races across the screen with unstoppable speed, whipping at you with its tail.

  • Spend Your Spoils: Collect worms from defeated foes and trade them at the shopkeeper for powerful items like Drones.

  • Achievements & Atmosphere: Earn 4 achievements (so far) while enjoying lush landscape decorations, flowers, and ambient details across 6 unique rooms.

  • JUICE:  Worms and damage numbers explode from your enemies like a fireworks display.

Upcoming (WIP, not guaranteed)

  • 300+ upgrades.

  • Over 80 unique enemy types.

  • Swag (hats, etc.)

  • 20+ new boss fights (and their associated biomes).

  • VFX improvements.

  • More of, and improved versions, of just about everything above.

More features coming ASAP. Thanks for playing!

legal_notice: Modding of this game is allowed, resale is disallowed.
name: DuckLaserDuck

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i3 7100 or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: No recommendation. Integrated CPU graphics will work.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Not required
  • VR Support: Not supported
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i3 8100 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 580 or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • VR Support: Not supported

short_description: The juiciest roguelike, bursting with bright colors, massive explosions, and flashy VFX. Unlike other games that limit your synergies, DuckLaserDuck throws the doors wide open. With a vast arsenal of upgrades at your disposal, you can craft wild, overpowered combos without restraint.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese
